title: Very low fps on league
body: Hello, ive been playing league for 3 years and have never had a problem with my fps until now. I have a gtx 980 reference card, 16gb 1600mhz ram, i7-3770 3.4ghz cpu, 120gb ssd, 2tb hdd, 1 tb hdd, 500w psu. been using the same card since purchased to play and never went below 200fps, now the past month has been showing 40-60fps sometimes dunking to 10fps. plz helps

replies.body: Alot people is having fps drops and all riot do is " fps guide " instead of actually find the real cause of it
ill just hav to get a 1060 or something :( sell this card
I have a 1060...I get 80fps with the new patch. My brother has the 1080, and doesn't even maintain 144fps. League is seriously messed up, not your card

Ooooo that's one heck of a drop in fps. Let's see if we can pump those numbers back up. 

Since that card is definitely up to par, this might have something to do with some iffy software like a bad driver or something running in the background that is affecting your performance. Look over our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for the most common fps solutions.
